about_the_game:
About This Game

Welcome to the immersive world of Wolves in Sheep's Clothing, an asymmetrical multiplayer game that blends strategy, deception, and heart-pounding action in a unique rural setting. Players are cast in the roles of either diligent farmers or cunning wolves, each with their own objectives and abilities, in a dynamic game of cat-and-mouse... or should we say, wolf-and-sheep?

Key Features:

  • Dual Roles with Unique Objectives: Embark on the game as either a farmer tasked with protecting your precious flock from unseen predators, or a wolf, disguising yourself among the very sheep you aim to devour. Each role offers a distinct play style and set of objectives, ensuring varied and engaging gameplay.

  • Deception and Detection: As a wolf, blend in with the flock, eliminating sheep and strategically choosing when to reveal your true monstrous form for a burst of speed and invulnerability. As a farmer, use your wits and your gun to identify and eliminate the wolf threat, but be warned: one wrong shot could diminish your own flock.

  • Transformative Abilities: Wolves possess the ability to temporarily unveil their true form, becoming faster and invulnerable but also visible to the farmer. This ability introduces a high-risk, high-reward strategy that can turn the tide of the game.

  • Strategic Tagging System: Farmers can tag sheep, marking them with paint for easier identification. This mechanic adds an extra layer of strategy, allowing farmers to mark suspected wolves or protect certain sheep from their own potentially fatal misjudgments.

  • Engaging Multiplayer Experience: Designed for thrilling multiplayer sessions, the game pits friends and foes against each other in a battle of wit, strategy, and deception. Each match is an unpredictable adventure, keeping players on their toes and ensuring that no two games are the same.

  • Varied Environments: Play across a diverse range of beautiful, pastoral settings that influence gameplay. From tranquil meadows to stormy nights, the environment plays a crucial role in the strategy and outcome of each match.

The Ultimate Game of Deception
In Wolves in Sheep's Clothing, every player's strategy, decision-making, and ability to deceive or deduce will be tested. Will you cunningly lead the wolves to victory, picking off the sheep and overcoming the farmer? Or will you, as the farmer, protect your flock and rid the field of the predatory threat?

Step Into the Pasture
Gather your friends, choose your role, and dive into the pastoral chaos of Wolves in Sheep's Clothing. Whether you're stalking through the grass as a wolf or guarding your flock with a vigilant eye, every game promises to be an engaging mix of strategy, suspense, and unexpected turns. Will you emerge as the sly predator or the savvy protector? The fields await your strategy.
